entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 20.9 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -41.5°C
Wind: S 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
